item.title: KVUE
item.description: score:1116 Chances: Kenvue Inc., the consumer brand spinoff of Johnson & Johnson (J&J), reported strong quarterly earnings and beat analyst estimates on both the top and bottom lines, indicating a positive start for the newly public company. Kenvue’s forecast for full-year profit above Wall Street estimates, driven by resilient demand for skincare and self-care products, such as Neutrogena and Tylenol, signals confidence in its business outlook.
